results.description: Kevin Shine joins Nottinghamshire as an assistant coach after 14 years as lead fast bowling coach at the ECB.
results.shortTitle: Shine joins Notts as assistant coach
results.title: Kevin Shine: Former England fast bowling coach joins Nottinghamshire as assistant

results.description: Nottinghamshire off-spinner Matthew Carter signs a new deal which keeps him at the club until the end of the 2021 season.
results.shortTitle: Notts spinner Carter extends contract
results.title: Matt Carter: Nottinghamshire spinner extends contract at Trent Bridge

results.description: Durham have re-signed Paul Coughlin two years after the all-rounder left the club to join Nottinghamshire.
results.shortTitle: Durham re-sign Coughlin from Notts
results.title: Paul Coughlin: Durham re-sign all-rounder from Nottinghamshire

results.description: Batsman Ben Compton signs his first professional contract at Nottinghamshire after agreeing a one-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Compton signs one-year deal with Notts
results.title: Ben Compton: Nottinghamshire batsman agrees one-year deal

results.description: Peter Moores is to stay on as Notts head coach, despite the club's winless Championship season which saw them relegated.
results.shortTitle: Moores signs new two-year Notts deal
results.title: Peter Moores: Nottinghamshire coach to stay on despite winless season

results.description: Batsman Alex Hales, who lost his England central contract last month, has signed for Sydney Thunder in the Big Bash League.
results.shortTitle: Hales to play for Sydney Thunder in BBL
results.title: Big Bash League: Alex Hales signs for Sydney Thunder

results.description: With the 2019 county cricket season over, keep up to date with the latest signings, departures and rumours for 2020.

thumbnail.altText: Miguel Cummins has ended his West Indies career to join Middlesex as a Kolpak player

results.description: Surrey and Nottinghamshire draw their final Division One match of the season as no play is possible on the final day.
results.shortTitle: Wet outfield leads to Surrey-Notts draw
results.title: County Championship: Surrey and Nottinghamshire draw

results.description: Surrey and England batsman Ollie Pope makes his eighth first-class hundred, but their game against Notts looks set for a draw.
results.shortTitle: England's Pope hits ton for Surrey
results.title: County Championship: Ollie Pope hits century for Surrey against Notts

results.description: Just two overs are possible on day two of Surrey's Championship match against Nottinghamshire, as rain hits The Oval.
results.shortTitle: Only two overs bowled between Surrey & Notts
results.title: County Championship: Rain disrupts Surrey v Nottinghamshire

results.description: Nottinghamshire's teenage all-rounder Joey Evison, who made his England Under-19s debut this summer, signs a three-year contract.
results.shortTitle: Teenager Evison pens three-year Notts deal
results.title: Nottinghamshire: Teenage England U19s all-rounder Joey Evison signs three-year deal

results.description: Ticket sales in English Twenty20 cricket soar in 2019 - and it's not just down to England winning the Cricket World Cup.
results.shortTitle: T20 ticket sales reach new peak in 2019
results.title: T20 Blast: Booming English ticket sales reach new peak in 2019 World Cup year

results.description: With the county season just about finished for 2019, who did BBC Sport users choose as their best Championship XI?
results.shortTitle: Who is in your county team of the season?

results.description: Ollie Pope marks his England call-up with 78 not out for Surrey against relegated Nottinghamshire at The Oval.
results.shortTitle: Pope & Borthwick put Surrey in charge

results.description: Defending champions Worcestershire Rapids defend 11 off the final two overs to beat Notts Outlaws by one run in a thrilling T20 Blast semi-final.
results.shortTitle: Defending champions Worcs beat Notts in semi
results.title: T20 Blast Finals Day: Worcestershire Rapids beat Notts Outlaws by one run in semi

results.description: Worcestershire Rapids beat Notts Outlaws by one run as Wayne Purnell bowls a dot ball to see his side progress to the final of the T20 Blast at Edgbaston.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Rapids reach T20 Blast final with dramatic last-ball win
results.title: T20 Blast finals: Worcestershire Rapids beat Notts Outlaws by one run

results.description: Worcestershire bid to become the first team to retain English cricket's T20 title, but can Notts, Essex or Derbyshire stop them?
results.shortTitle: Worcestershire aim to make T20 history
results.title: T20 Blast Finals Day: Will Worcestershire, Notts, Essex or Derbyshire win at Edgbaston?

results.description: Batsman Alex Hales can play for England again despite losing his central contract, says director of cricket Ashley Giles.
results.shortTitle: Door not closed for Hales - Giles
results.title: Alex Hales: Ashley Giles says England door not closed for batsman

results.description: An over-reliance on young talent was a key reason for Nottinghamshire's relegation from Division One, says boss Mick Newell.
results.shortTitle: 'Poor' Notts deserved relegation - Newell
results.title: Mick Newell: Nottinghamshire relegation was 'deserved'
